EmailTemplate.name: ! 7th January Primary Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: Update | Primary School Welcome Meetings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
Please accept my apologies for the last minute postponement of yesterday’s Welcome Meeting. As I hope you can imagine having read Mr Mincher’s email yesterday I was unavoidably detained.
I have rescheduled the second Parent Welcome Meeting for tomorrow afternoon, 7 January from 1.30-2.30.
If you would like to join the link for the meeting, please find the meet link below:
meet.google.com/yhf-edxw-vua
I look forward to seeing many of you there.
Best wishes,
Mr Simon Sharp
Head of Primary
